channel.title: Redding|Shasta County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Redding|Shasta County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 675
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 675 - South Bonnyview Road/Churn Creek Road.

item.title: I-5 South - Exits 678B and 678A
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 678B - CA-44 West. Approaching Exit 678A - CA-44 East/Lassen National Park. I-5 continues south towards Red Bluff and Sacramento.

item.title: I-5 South - Exits 680 and 678B-A
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 680 - CA-299/Lake Blvd. Approaching Exit 678B-A - CA-44 Jct. CA-299 is the northern most east-west highway that connects the coast with Nevada in California.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 681A
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 681A - Twin View Blvd.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 681B
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 681B - CA-273/Market St. CA-273 is a business loop of sorts, paralleling the west side of I-5 through Redding and Anderson.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 682
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 682 - Oasis Road.

item.title: CA-273 South at CA-299 West
item.description: CA-273 south/CA-299 west approaching CA-299 west.

item.title: CA-273 South at CA-299 West
item.description: CA-273 south/CA-299 west at CA-299 west to Weaverville and Eureka.

item.title: CA-299 West Approaching I-5
item.description: CA-299 west approaching I-5. For I-5 north to Portland, use right lane. For I-5 south to Sacramento, use left lane.

item.title: CA-299 West Approaching I-5
item.description: CA-299 west approaching I-5 North, 1/2 mile; I-5 South, 3/4 mile.

item.title: CA-299 West Approaching I-5
item.description: CA-299 west approaching I-5 north to Portland, south to Sacramento.

item.title: CA-299 West at CA-273
item.description: CA-299 west at CA-273. CA-299 west follows CA-273 south through Redding.

item.title: CA-299 West at I-5 North
item.description: CA-299 west at I-5 north to Portland.

item.title: CA-299 West Exit 141
item.description: CA-299 west at Exit 141, Churn Creek Road/Hawley Road.

item.title: CA-299 West Exit 141
item.description: CA-299 west approaching Exit 141, Churn Creek Road/Hawley Road, 1 mile.
